FuncDef: The display lacp troubleshooting command displays the reasons why LACP goes Down.
Examples: 1          2017-01-29 22:56:47        The interface bandwidth was invalid. Pleas
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If LACP goes Down, run the display lacp troubleshooting command to check the reason. The command output helps locate the fault.
The display lacp troubleshooting command can display the reasons for the latest five LACP Down events.
